member.name: M:Terrasoft.Services.IdentityClient.GetOpenIdAuthorizeRequestUrl(System.String,System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Returns url for authorize OpenID request to auth server.
member.param: Redirect uri for returning auth code. Must exactly match one of the allowed redirect URIs for that client.
Auth server will echo back the state value on the token response.
Auth server will echo back the nonce value in the identity token, this is for replay protection.
Response type. Possible values: 'id_token', 'token', 'id_token token', 'code', 'code id_token', 'code id_token token'

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Services.IdentityClient.GetOpenIdAuthorizeRequestUrl(System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.String)

Response type. Possible values: 'id_token', 'token', 'id_token token', 'code', 'code id_token', 'code id_token token'

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Services.IdentityClient.GetOpenIdEndSessionRequestUrl(System.String,System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Returns url for end session OpenID request to auth server.
member.param: Id token associated with the user's session.
Uri for returning after Identity session finished.
Custom state which will be passed as parameter to redirect URI.
member.remarks: Logout url can be non-openid compliant and can be set using placeholders like https://mydomain.auth.us.amazoncognito.com/logout?client_id={client_id}&redirect_uri={redirect_uri}
